commitResults.messageTitle: Change name of character from Duke to Octoplush
Add input loop to echo commands and exit on bye
commitResults.messageBody:
The main class only printed the greeting and farewell messages without
interacting with the user.

Let's:
* Add a loop to read user input
* Echo back each command
* Stop only when the user types "bye"
This allows the chatbot to mimic a basic conversation flow.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add task storage and list command
Add Task class with mark and unmark support
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduce a Task class to represent each item.
Replace the string array with an array of Task objects.

Add commands (where n is the task number):
* mark <n> to mark a task as done
* unmark <n> to reset a task back to not done
